# Example Project

A sample project demonstrating how to create llms.txt files.

## Overview

This is an example llms.txt file that provides context about a fictional project. It contains key information that helps LLMs understand the project structure, purpose, and how to work with it.

## Project Structure

```
example-project/
├── src/           # Source code
├── tests/         # Test files
├── docs/          # Documentation
└── README.md      # Project readme
```

## Key Features

- Feature 1: Core functionality
- Feature 2: Additional capabilities
- Feature 3: Integration points

## Usage

```bash
npm install example-project
npm run start
```

Please see our contributing guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
